themes: need for transitional and bridge funding
two-tiered funding model for legacy and emerging groups
key_phrases: rapid funding shift has destabilized long-standing groups
implement transitional support, such as bridge grants
capacity building—offering training, mentorship, and operational support
establish a feedback loop that includes artists and cultural leaders
barriers_identified: destabilization of long-standing groups due to rapid funding shifts
lack of transitional support for groups facing sudden cuts
unclear communication regarding criteria, timelines, and processes
smaller or under-resourced organizations unable to compete fairly
top-down decision-making disconnected from community needs
solutions_proposed: implement transitional support, such as bridge grants
conduct regular impact assessments to adjust funding strategies
adopt a two-tiered funding model for legacy institutions and emerging voices
provide clearer communication, transparent criteria, and consistent processes
invest in capacity building: training, mentorship, operational support
establish a feedback loop including artists and cultural leaders in decision-making
